name: GetUsersInfo
description: set, get and delete user1 and user2 info.

handlers.description: This flow will set user1 info and get the same within the flow. based upon the query params provided, the subflow will be executed and return the response.
handlers.name: Set_Get_User1_Set_User2

handlers.description: This flow will return the user2 info which is set in another flow. For this flow to return the user2 info, the flow in which the user2 info was set need to be executed first.
handlers.name: Get_User2
